local_intent: Ensure the T-block is visible, move above it, align for a push, and verify continued visibility.
assumptions: Clearance exists to move above the block
Camera remains available for visibility check
coherence_with_global: Uses the same perceive step and approach parameters as the GLOBAL_BT (ScanForTarget/IsObjectVisible, MoveAbove 0.04m, ApproachAndAlign 0.01 tol) and stops before yaw setting and push.
